title: L4T: New Life Chapter: New Zealand (Just moved my LOL account to oce)
body:
Hello All,

Casual Player here, (very casual, had my account ages, still only lvl 21) - But when I find a good group to play with, I do play often, little in an evening, mostly weekend.
For Draft I have been playing Support as {{champion:37}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:40}}   (But always open to new Champ's a play styles)
For giggles in blind or twisted treeline: I do a bit of everything, Top/Jungle: {{champion:68}}  Mid & Twisted Treeline: {{champion:1}}  ADC: {{champion:51}} {{champion:22}} 

I'm looking for a group of players (Team, Clan, Guild, whatever) (or just a 1,2 individuals) who play for both serious and fun.
Willing to teach, but also derp/laugh/f*** around.

I only recently came to New Zealand from UK for work. I have today moved my LOL account, and will start to play again.
Experience with comms and team play. (Previously played, Eve Online, WOW, Battlefield, etc)

I guess let me know if you want to game.

Currently watching EU LCS. 
Catch you on the rift.
Mightymurph

replies.body:
So you're level 21 and want to teach people?
Please explain.
i think they meant they are looking for a group that is willing to teach

> [{quoted}](name=Xenonfrenzy,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=sGyjyrG1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-29T08:39:28.142+0000)
>
> i think they meant they are looking for a group that is willing to teach

That would be "willing to learn", he/she clearly said "willing to teach".

My apologies, I will use my English skills properly....
>I am seeking people  _**WHO ARE**_ willing to teach _**ME**_, but also derp/laugh/f* around.

Better??
